description: Try our easy to follow Tropical Pavlova recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tropical Pavlova Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: fresh fruit (we used assorted berries, cherries, apricots & passionfruit, to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Line a tray with baking paper. Combine sugar and water in a saucepan over low heat. Stir for 5 minutes until dissolved. Increase heat to high and bring to the boil. Boil, without stirring, for 5 to 7 minutes or until mixture turns golden. Remove from heat and set aside until bubbles subside. Add almonds. Pour mixture onto prepared tray. Allow to cool.

Place cream, icing sugar and coconut powder into a large bowl. Beat until thick. Place meringue onto a plate. Break almond toffee into pieces. Dollop cream over meringue. Top with fruit and toffee. Serve.
